title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported one.
EB: Importing a new image should update the layout to display the newly imported image.
SR: To reproduce:1. Open the layout that contains an image.2. Import a new image file, named 'image1.jpg', into the layout.3. Observe the display to see if the new image is displayed correctly.
